trans-unit.source: Defines values that specify the hosting model for the provider.
trans-unit.target: 定義可指定提供者的主控模型的值。

trans-unit.source: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.
trans-unit.target: 注意：WMI .NET 程式庫目前被視為最終狀態，針對影響這些程式庫的非安全性相關問題，不會提供進一步的開發、增強功能或更新。

trans-unit.source: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.
trans-unit.target: [MI API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) 應使用於所有新的開發。

trans-unit.source: To learn more about WMI provider hosting models, see the Provider Hosting and Security topic on MSDN online.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解有關 WMI 提供者裝載模型的詳細資訊，請參閱提供者裝載和安全性主題 MSDN 線上。

trans-unit.source: Activates the provider as a decoupled provider.
trans-unit.target: 將提供者啟動為低耦合提供者。

trans-unit.source: Activates the provider in the provider host process that is running under the LocalService account.
trans-unit.target: 在提供者主機處理序 (於 LocalService 帳戶下執行) 中啟動提供者。

trans-unit.source: Activates the provider in the provider host process that is running under the LocalSystem account.
trans-unit.target: 在提供者主機處理序 (於 LocalSystem 帳戶下執行) 中啟動提供者。

trans-unit.source: Activates the provider in the provider host process that is running under the NetworkService account.
trans-unit.target: 在提供者主機處理序 (於 NetworkService 帳戶下執行) 中啟動提供者。
